title: 谁有飞行mod，建高空建筑有些麻烦。。。
author: 多E木

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
建議裝單人指令MOD (Single Player Commands)

搬運帖裡有最新 v2.9_1
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5346-1-1.html

安裝及指令說明參考這裡:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-4104-1-1.html

replies.author: 一世清凉
replies.txt_content: 单人指令，飞机MOD，热气球MOD都不错，你想要那个呢？
